thread.title: John Abraham to pair up with Sonam Kapoor for his next 'Happy News'
thread.title_full: John Abraham to pair up with Sonam Kapoor for his next 'Happy News' - Entertainment

author: The Hitlist Team
title: John Abraham to pair up with Sonam Kapoor for his next 'Happy News'
text:
After Shruti Haasan (Welcome Back and Rocky Handsome) and Sonakshi Sinha (Force 2), John Abraham is likely to now team up with Sonam Kapoor in Ashwini Dheer’s upcoming film, Happy News.

John Abraham 
Dheer had earlier directed Son of Sardaar (2012). John is said to be keen on some fresh pairings with younger heroines.

Sonam Kapoor 
Meanwhile, John’s recent knee injury has delayed the upcoming China schedule of Force 2.

Sonakshi Sinha 

Shruti Haasan
